career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths after a course, including Forensic Scientist and Assembly Line Manager, with an average annual placement package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA, and encourages individuals to pursue a career in basic sciences.
career_info.raw_content:

• Forensic Scientist
• Assembly Line Manager
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.
